content:
TITLE: Building API Documentation Files
DESCRIPTION: Command to run both bundle_json and bundle_yaml scripts to generate master OpenAPI files in different formats.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Podcastindex-org/docs-api/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Linting OpenAPI Source Files
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the Redoc linter on the source YAML files to check for errors or inconsistencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Podcastindex-org/docs-api/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn lint
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating JSON OpenAPI Documentation
DESCRIPTION: Command to generate the master OpenAPI file in JSON format (pi_api.json) in the docs folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Podcastindex-org/docs-api/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn bundle_json
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating YAML OpenAPI Documentation
DESCRIPTION: Command to generate the master OpenAPI file in YAML format (pi_api.yaml) in the docs folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Podcastindex-org/docs-api/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn bundle_yaml
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Redoc Preview Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Redoc preview server for viewing API documentation locally at http://localhost:8080.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Podcastindex-org/docs-api/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn preview
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Serving Documentation Files Locally
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a simple server in the docs folder to serve the release files locally.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Podcastindex-org/docs-api/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn server
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting LiveReload File Watcher
DESCRIPTION: Command to start a LiveReload file watcher that automatically refreshes connected browser pages when files change.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Podcastindex-org/docs-api/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn reload
```
